autoplay.name: Auto Play
autoplay.description: Choose if slider should begin automation automatically

startdelay.name: Auto Play delay
startdelay.description: How long to wait until auto-play start

keyboard.name: Keyboard control
keyboard.description: Select if right/left arrow should control slides

loop.name: Loop slideshow
loop.description: Should slidshow start from beginning after reaching end

pauseonhover.name: Pause on mouseover
pauseonhover.description: Pause slideshow if mouse enters slider area

width.name: Slider width
width.description: Force slider width to this value, leave blank for auto-adjust (depending on slider images)

height.name: Slider height
height.description: Force slider height to this value, leave blank for auto-adjust (depending on slider images)

scaleimages.name: Scale slider images
scaleimages.description: Whether to scale images in slides to fit slider forced resolution (width, height)

captionstyle.name: Caption style
captionstyle.description: Select where captions should appear on individual slides (none=dont show captions)

captioneffect.name: Caption effect
captioneffect.description: Choose if caption should have its own show/hide effect

slidedisplaytime.description: How long individual slide should be displayed
slidedisplaytime.name: Slide display time

effecttime.description: How long animation shoud take? Lower = faster animation
effecttime.name: Animation speed
